name: Powell Industries, Inc.
description: Powell Industries, Inc. is a leading provider of equipment and services for the electrical power generation and distribution industry. Founded in 1947 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, Powell is known for its innovative solutions in the design, manufacturing, and integration of electrical equipment. The company specializes in custom-engineered power distribution and control systems, serving various sectors including oil and gas, renewable energy, water and wastewater, and industrial markets. Powell's products include switchgear, control systems, and enclosures, which are critical for maintaining the efficiency and reliability of electrical power systems. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, Powell utilizes advanced technologies and engineering expertise to deliver high-performance solutions tailored to client needs. The company is also focused on sustainability and energy efficiency, actively contributing to the transition toward cleaner energy solutions. Powell Industries continues to expand its global presence and enhance its product offerings, aiming to meet the evolving demands of the electrical industry.

seo.meta_title: Powell Industries, Inc. | Electrical Power Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Powell Industries, Inc., a leader in electrical power equipment and services. Discover innovative solutions for power generation and distribution.

faq.answer: Evan Powell is the CEO of Powell Industries, Inc.

faq.answer: Powell Industries is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.question: What are Powell Industries' main products?
faq.answer: Powell's main products include switchgear, control systems, and enclosures.
